MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G69 postcode area of Glasgow. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7am to safely carry out alternations to the network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 06:03am on Tuesday, 30 March 2021
